Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel De Petris, you'll be centrally located in Rome, steps from Palazzo Barberini and Piazza Barberini. This hotel is close to Roman Forum and Colosseum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 65 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, and cribs/infant beds (complimentary) can be requested.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and an elevator (lift).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is 11:00 AM
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.


Make yourself at home in one of the 65 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, and cribs/infant beds (complimentary) can be requested.

With a stay at Hotel De Petris, you'll be centrally located in Rome, steps from Palazzo Barberini and Piazza Barberini. This hotel is close to Roman Forum and Colosseum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Palazzo Barberini - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Piazza Barberini - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Sistina Theater - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
National Gallery of Ancient Art - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Trevi Fountain - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Quirinale Palace - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Palace of Expositions - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Trinita dei Monti Church - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Keats-Shelley House - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Spanish Steps - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Barcaccia Fountain - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Caffe Greco - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Galleria Alberto Sordi - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Santa Maria della Vittoria - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Palazzo Chigi - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 14.3 km / 8.9 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 22.9 km / 14.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel De Petris is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
